item.title: Rep. Jayapal Introduces Bill to Protect Homeless on Public Land
item.description: Rep. Pramila Jayapal, D-Wash., has introduced legislation that would prohibit the removal of homeless people from federal land.

item.title: Scott Brown to Newsmax: No Problem With GOP Differences on Megabill
item.description: Former Sen. Scott Brown, R-Mass., told Newsmax that he doesn't have a problem with Republicans who voted against the megabill that passed the Senate.
